醝醝醝

醝字的基本解释

醝
cuō
白酒。
古同“鹾”，盐：“满船都载相公醝。”

醝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuō］
［《廣韻》昨何切，平歌，從。］
(1)酒，白酒。
(2)同“鹺”。盐。

醝字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醝； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1286第13
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?才何切，音?。【玉篇】白酒也。【周禮·天官·酒正·酇白釋文】卽今之白醝酒也。【張華·輕薄篇】蒼梧竹葉淸，宜城九醞醝。【集韻】通作酇。　又【集韻】此我切，音瑳。山醝，栗名。

醝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
醝字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
cuō
Liquor.
Gu Tong, "鹾", salt: "The ship is full of xianggong."
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [cuō]
["Guangyun" He cut yesterday, Ping Ge, from. ]
(1) Liquor, liquor.
(2) Same as "鹾". salt.

[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醝; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1286 to 13
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? How to cut, sound?. [Jade articles] Liquor also. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Jiuzheng·Heng Bai Shi Wen】The Bai Di Jiu also in this day. 【Zhang Hua·Thinness Articles】Cangwu, Bamboo Leaves and Cheong, Yicheng Nine Brewing Li. 【Ji Yun】Tong Zuo Meng.　[Jiyun] I cut this, sound 瑳. Shansi, chestnut name.
